title: Svalbard Neoproterozoic–Ordovician δ¹³C and δ¹⁸O Isotope Data

creators.name: Fran Meyer
creators.affiliation: Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Pennsylvania State University

creators.name: Julia Wilcots
creators.affiliation: Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Princeton University

creators.name: Tyler Mackey
creators.affiliation: Massachusetts Institute of Technology, University of New Mexico

creators.name: Marjorie Cantine
creators.affiliation: Massachusetts Institute of Technology, University of Washington

creators.name: Sam Goldberg
creators.affiliation: Massachusetts Institute of Technology, University of Miami

description: This dataset provides δ¹³C and δ¹⁸O isotopic data from carbonate strata of Neoproterozoic through Ordovician age, using samples collected from Ny Friesland and Nordaustlandet, Svalbard in field seasons in 2014, 2016, and 2017.
